titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Sudbury in the county of Suffolk at a lecture set up there, for the last summers half year with the approbation of the bishop of diocese, by the clergy of that deanery, to preach upon the points in controversie, between the Church of Rome, and the Church of England / by William Battie ...
titleStmt.author: Battie, William, 1634 or 5-1706.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
